data.eml:eml: New and little-known species of the genus Lacon Laporte, 1838 (Coleoptera: Elateridae) of China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Prosvirov, Alexander S. (2016): New and little-known species of the genus Lacon Laporte, 1838 (Coleoptera: Elateridae) of China. Zootaxa 4132 (3): 373-382, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4132.3.5
